comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Son of George Jay Gould I; grandson of the 19th-century Wall Street robber baron (and Titan of the Great Northern Railroad), Jay Gould.

See Harry Angstrom's note, below, and the Wikipedia entry it references.

comment.author: 45656842@N00
comment._content: I didn't think he looked like a Georgie.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Oops!  Sorry for the mix up. This is one of five captions and images that got out of alignment back when the negatives were first scanned. Now fixed!

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
Harry Angstrom:

It does look like this is Jay Gould II.  We will update the record with this more full name. Thanks for the heads up!
